price: 93. Behalve Allah? Kunnen zij jullie helpen of zichzelf helpen?”
arabic: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ هَلۡ يَنصُرُونَكُمۡ أَوۡ يَنتَصِرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: min dūni al-lahi hal yanṣurūnakum aw yantaṣirūna
